solution_line_template: Merry's brother takes care of {merry_lambs} + {brother_more_than_merry} = <<{merry_lambs}+{brother_more_than_merry}={brother_lambs}>>{brother_lambs} lambs.
So, together Merry and her brother have {merry_lambs} + {brother_lambs} = <<{merry_lambs}+{brother_lambs}={total_lambs}>>{total_lambs} lambs.
